radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
radiographic_examinations.findings: Small bilateral pleural effusions, left greater than right, with associated compressive atelectasis. An 18-mm hypodense lesion in the lower pole of the right kidney likely represents renal cyst. A 15 x 11 mm hypodense lesion in the tail of the pancreas is consistent with IPMN. Mild peripancreatic stranding is noted. Trace free fluid within the abdomen. No pseudocyst formation or pancreatic necrosis noted. Small amount of free pelvic fluid. 9-mm lucent lesion within the right iliac bone adjacent to the sacroiliac joint.
